Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch with the same coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch along the negative Z-axis to a depth of 0.025 units, effectively removing material from the first part. This step creates a curved top edge on the rectangular prism. Descriptions: - **Part 1:** A three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The front face is angled at approximately 45 degrees from the top and bottom faces. The dimensions of the prism are 2 units by 3 units by 4 units (height, width, length). - **Part 2:** A three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a curved top edge. The overall dimensions are 0.0875 units by 0.0875 units by 0.025 units (height, width, length).</description>
